name: Mole Hole (Hene Studios)
description:
Story

Get away from the crazy scientist and his drill into the depth of earth. But beware: Your way down will be impeded by several obstacles so that your escape won´t be as easy as imagined.

  • Be the best and dig as deep as you can
  • Compare your high score with friends and other players around the world
  • Experience the hand-drawn world of the cute mole
General:

Mole Hole is a so-called arcade endless scroller. These kind of games typically end when the player fails to survive. The objective of the game is to dig as deep as possible and to reach the highest score by destroying as much obstacles as possible. Throughout, you are supported by a handful of items (currently six) which offer the following advantages:

  • Worm -> Be immortal for a certain time
  • Golden Paw -> Gain extra points for destroying obstacles
  • Shamrock -> Increase your drop rate of items
  • Metal Claw -> Doubles the damage to obstacles.
  • Plug -> Seal oil or water sources
  • Bomb -> Destroy all obstacles immediately
  • Lamp -> Illuminates the playing field after the light on the drill has failed
  • Shovel -> Extends the striking range to 3 adjacent obstacles
Have fun with the Game !!!
